name: NSDraggingFormation
desc: These constants control the visual format of multiple items being dragged.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Drag images maintain their set positions relative to each other.

items.name: case pile
items.desc: Drag images are placed on top of each other with random rotations.

items.name: case list
items.desc: Drag images are laid out vertically, non-overlapping with the left edges aligned.

items.name: case stack
items.desc: Drag images are laid out overlapping diagonally.
